title: OXO Heavy Duty Scrub Brush
description: Cover maximum ground with the OXO Good Grips Heavy Duty Scrub Brush.  The Brush is ideally sized to scrub broad surfaces including tiled walls, shower stalls, floors, countertops and more with maximum efficiency. The Brush features durable bristles for heavy duty cleaning and a soft, comfortable, non-slip grip.

asset.author: OXO
asset.description:
http://www.oxo.com/p-337-heavy-duty-scrub-brush.aspx

Cover maximum ground with the OXO Good Grips Heavy Duty Scrub Brush.  The Brush is ideally sized to scrub broad surfaces including tiled walls, shower stalls, floors, countertops and more with maximum efficiency. The Brush features durable bristles for heavy duty cleaning and a soft, comfortable, non-slip grip.

transcripts: At OXO we created a group of cleaning brushes that are designed for very specific household tasks so the end result is always sparkling clean. The OXO heavy duty scrub brush is perfect for large surfaces like tubs, tile walls, counter tops, and floors. The tough bristles easily scrub away mildew, grime, and soap scum. The soft comfortable non slip handle provides a secure grip even when wet and it peanut shaped so it's easy to grab around the middle or broad so you can lean you're full weight into the job. Here's a good tip, try using this brush to clean off muddy sneakers and cleats after a wet soccer game.
